titleStmt.title: The Ladies Charity School-house roll of Highgate, or, A subscription of many noble, well-disposed ladies for the easie carrying of it on
titleStmt.author: W. B. (William Blake), fl. 1650-1670.

notesStmt.note: "Written by William Blake, house-keeper to the Ladies Charity-School"--p. 292.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Appeals for donations, followed by: Silver drops, or, Serious things: p. 79-292.
